channel.title: Freenas on Victor's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Freenas on Victor's Blog

item.title: How to Configure a UPS Between Linux and FreeNAS
item.description: After having bad memory modules due to power outages at home (on both my FreeNAS and my desktop) I knew I had to invest on a UPS. I will cover the details of the configuration, and as usual, I will try to go straight to the point. Keep in mind that I’m running Arch on my desktop and FreeNAS-11.3-U1, and that the UPS is connected to my desktop (master) via USB.

item.title: How to Move Plex Installation on FreeNAS 11.3
item.description: I had some free time this weekend and decided to upgrade my FreeNAS. I went from 11.1 to 11.3-UI and the upgrade installed without any issues. However, after the reboot I discovered that my jails and plugins were missing from the UI and that they were not running. I had read the manual (FreeNAS® 11.3-U1 User Guide) before the upgrade and and the instructions did not mention anything about the plugins, so I was little worried.
